moves.1... c5 2. Bc4 Nc6 3. Nf3 Nf6 4. e5 Nd4: looking for an easy mate with Queen to h7, i didn't think that he would fall for it...
moves.12... g5 13. Qh3 Re8+: a little delay while in the process of thwarting my mate, however, i shall carry on...
moves.16... Ke7 17. Qg7 b6 18. Bc4: I was looking for a check with 19...Qg7xf7 but...
moves.19. O-O: might as well castle, I am in good position and pretty well developed
moves.19... Kd8: he takes shelter from what is impending
moves.20. Bxf7: and i take advantage of it
moves.21... Qc2: i'm sure he didn't realize that he did that
moves.22. Bxc2: this gave me quite a considerable amount of leverage
moves.24. Bxc6: Im up on material so i take it, the first of my sacrifices
moves.25... Rb8 26. Qxa7 g4 27. Bh6: constantly on the offence, now that im up i cant give him any time
moves.27... Rh8 28. Qg7 Re8 29. Qxf6+: and thus begins a series of checks
locking the pawns so that he will have trouble getting queened
moves.33... Re2: not sure where this came from
moves.40. Rd1: from this point on I really should have done h2-h3 or something like that to prevent checkmate
moves.40... Rb4 41. Nd2: another sacrifice, i figure that it will get rid of his only rook when i will have two left,
moves.42. Nxc4 Kd7 43. d6 Bg5 44. Nb6+: i want to get that pawn queened
moves.45... Kxb6 46. Rac1: the last sacrifice, the rook is guarding d8, the queening square. I throw a little bait out and...
moves.47. d8=Q+ Kc6 48. Rxc1:
from here it is all just pincer movement, you don't have to read any furthur

if you have any comments or advice just message me.--------marc15
